programme.title: Buster Can't Wait To See His Friends
programme.desc: The curious six-year-old Buster is a friendly and eager-to-learn yellow bus who takes on new adventures.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Best Friends Game - When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep907
programme.desc: Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art - Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Paddington's Nature Club / Paddington's not Himself - Mr. Curry wants to become a ranger leader & creates nature club to impress Ms. Potts but are his facts correct? // Paddington has a fall and loses his climbing confidence - without climbing he doesn't feel like himself at all - what can he do?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep227
programme.desc: The Long Grass - The grass has grown so long that Peppa and George's ball gets lost. Grandpa arrives with his fantastic lawnmower and gets the grass cut in no time. Peppa and George find their plastic ball again and it bounces brilliantly on the short grass!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep228
programme.desc: Zoe Zebra, the Postman's Daughter - Mr. Zebra the Postman gets help from his daughter Zoë. Zoë has a very special letter for Peppa and George; an invitation to her birthday party. The party is fun, especially as it turns out that Zoë has invited all of Peppa and George’s friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep229
programme.desc: Painting - Peppa and George are painting. Daddy shows them how to mix paints and the three of them paint a beautiful picture of a cherry tree. Everything is going very well, until the ducks turn up and decide to run through the paint and all over the painting.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep173
programme.desc: The Blue Butterfly - Anna and her friends are on a mission to capture a photograph of a pretty flower, but on the search, they see a beautiful blue butterfly. The friends finally discover the best way to capture their enchanting photo.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep174
programme.desc: Achoo ! - Bubu teaches Christopher about allergies. And when he witnesses Anna sneezing uncontrollably when she is around Froga, he is convinced that she is allergic to her! They wonder if they will ever be able to live life as they once did!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Blue's Storytime with Camila - We dive deeper into American Sign Language and the Deaf community. Camila the librarian wants to tell a story with us using ASL, but what story? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep801
programme.desc: Pups Save a Runaway Rooster / Pups Save a Snowbound Cow - Chickaletta and Roosterio run away from a chicken show and get stuck on top of a runaway drone. // When Bettina wanders up Jake's mountain and gets caught in a snowstorm, it's up to the Paw Patrol to bring her safely down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep824
programme.desc: Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus - Wally the Walrus searches all over Adventure Bay for Cap'n Turbot and turns the town upside-down in the process.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Goodnight Central Forest / Steelzilla - When Sir Steel does not want to get out of bed, Professor Scratch plunges the whole city into darkness with a gigantic pair of sunglasses. // Sir Steel holds a grand parade but his giant Steel blimp grows to Godzilla sized and trashes the city!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Every Cloud/Rainbow Comet Rush - Bobbi wants to spend time with Jade, but there are candy floss clouds to worry about first! // Can Jade and the Deer Squad help the crystal comet release its rainbow colours? Only if Jade learns to trust her friends.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy - Jonathan & Paddington find a treasure map in a bottle on the lake! Judy & Toq also find a treasure map, but who will find the treasure first? // Mr. Gruber has always wanted to go to Italy & Paddington sets about helping his friend achieve his dream!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Paddington the Best Bear - Paddington wishes he could have been at Mr. & Mrs. Brown's wedding after seeing some photos, so they decide to do it all again!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' birthday - Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Bada-Bam / The Barbamartians - Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Baby Tooth / Slobber Slug - When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down. // A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Sink or Swim - The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep175
programme.desc: The Giant Strawberry - When Froga discovers an amazing oversized strawberry in her garden, she quickly becomes obsessed with it. Things come to a head when Froga discovers a bunch more giant strawberries and even Anna is driven away.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep176
programme.desc: The Quiet Game - After talking so much to her plants, Froga decides to save her voice by playing THE QUIET GAME. When she lays out the objective that her friends need to try to make her talk - it becomes a fun challenge for the gang to get her to crack.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Photo - Polaroid camera, she decides to take pictures of all her friends. Everyone thinks it's a great idea and Anna makes some great portraits. But things get complicated when she tries to take a group shot of everyone!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Cuddle Toy - Christopher is sad because he lost his cuddly toy so Bubu gives him his to use. But when Christopher looses that one too, it's a desperate search for missing cuddlies until Anna saves the day!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep117
programme.desc: A Very Busy Afternoon - Froga organises a gathering to share jam sandwiches with everyone, Ron and Christopher want to show off their acrobatic frisbee skills, Bubu invents a new game he wants to teach his friends - all at the same time!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Prank Day - Today is Prank day, Anna and her friends must compete to elect the best prankster of all. Everyone's doing a great except Christopher. The friends are surprised when the worst prankster turns out to be the best!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep230
programme.desc: Cuckoo Clock - Daddy Pig winds up the old cuckoo clock. When a wooden cuckoo pops out singing “Cuckoo!”, Peppa thinks it is very funny, but George has missed the whole thing. George does not want to miss the cuckoo again but the cuckoo only pops out once an hour.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep231
programme.desc: The Cycle Ride - Peppa and her family are going for a day’s cycle ride. Peppa loves cycling downhill but she’s not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppa’s friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep232
programme.desc: Ice Skating - Peppa and George are going ice-skating for the first time. Mummy Pig teaches Peppa to skate and soon she is having lots of fun. Peppa begins to teach George how to skate but it turns out he is a natural born skater. Peppa and George love ice-skating.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep233
programme.desc: Dentist - Peppa and George are at the dentist. Dr Elephant says that Peppa and George’s teeth are lovely and clean. But George’s plastic toy “Mr Dinosaur” teeth are a bit yellow. Dr Elephant polishes Mr Dinosaurs teeth until they are bright and shiny.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Bubbles - Peppa and George are playing with bubbles. When the bubble mixture runs out, Daddy Pig shows them how to make really big bubbles with an old tennis racket and soapy water. Then he makes a big, muddy, bubbly puddle for everyone to jump up and down in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Bedtime - It’s nearly time for bed and Peppa and George are called in for their bath. After that, they brush their teeth and get into bed. Soon they are fast asleep. Mummy and Daddy Pig finally sit down, but it’s been a long day and they are very sleepy too.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Swimming - Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool. Rebecca Rabbit is there too. She and Peppa are very proud of their swimming skills. Everyone is surprised to discover that Daddy Pig is very good at swimming and diving. Very good indeed.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Making Bread - Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned...

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Double Dare You / Roy - On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Cattle Drive - When Blaze and Starla encounter a herd of cows wandering out in the desert, they must embark on a wild west adventure to bring them back to Starla’s barn.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Musical! - In the first ever Blaze Musical, Blaze, AJ, Crusher, and Pickle are on a daring quest to find the pieces of the Broken Key and unlock a secret treasure

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Pups Save the Parrot / Pups Save the Queen Bee - The PAW Patrol heads to the jungle to help their friend Carlos find his lost parrot, Mateo! // When the PAW Patrol discovers a beehive in Cap'n Turbot's lighthouse, Ryder and the pups must work together to find the bees a new home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Pups Save an Elephant Family / Pups and the Mischievous Kittens - The pups' road trip through the savanna becomes a mission to reunite and rescue an elephant family! // To win the Spotless Town award, the PAW Patrol pups must save Adventure Bay from Mayer Humdinger's Kitten Catastrophe Crew!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Turnip For The Books / Magnet Maelstrom - Sir Steel almost crushes Platinum city with a giant turnip during a Vegetable Show. // When Sir Steel collects metal in the city for Muffin's pooch pamper parlor using a giant magnet, Deer Squad has to think out of the box to stop him.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Satellite flight - Everyone is grooving to Stu and Safia's dance song, so the Deer has to stop Steel's satellite from broadcasting hypnotic dance signals.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over - Paddington hurts his knee & goes to see Dr Yasmin. When she steps out, he steps UP and is mistaken for a doctor. // Can Mr. Brown's sleepover live up to Mrs. Brown's high standard when Simi and Toq come to stay for the night?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear - Paddington helps to hatch an egg, but it takes ages and when it finally cracks open he gets a real surprise! // Paddington wishes he could have been at Mr. and Mrs. Brown's wedding after seeing some photos, so they decide to do it all again!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep234
programme.desc: Dens - Peppa is playing in the tree-house with the girls, and George and the boys stay in the castle that Grandpa Pig built for them. But when it starts to rain and the garden is covered in muddy puddles, they rush out to play together!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep235
programme.desc: Grandpa's Little Train - Grandpa Pig has built a fantastic little train called “Gertrude” and he takes Peppa and George for a ride. Along the way they meet their friends and they all hop aboard. Peppa and George think that “Gertrude” is the very best train in the whole world

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep236
programme.desc: School Bus Trip - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her school friends on a school bus trip to the mountains. From the top of the mountains there is a fantastic view and Peppa and her friends have fun hearing echoes. After a great day out, the bus takes the children home

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep237
programme.desc: Rebecca Rabbit - Peppa and George are going to Rebecca Rabbit’s house today. It is a bit different to Peppa’s house; it is inside a hill, with tunnels instead of stairs. They enjoy playing rabbits and everyone is surprised when George discovers he likes carrots!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Zooli's New Pet! - Excited that Zooli is getting a new pet, the Guppies try to guess what kind of animal it is! Zooli loves many creatures, so her new pet could be anything in the animal kingdom. Will they guess the right one before it arrives?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Thankful with Blue - Josh is making a Thankful Book and is looking to find out what our friends in the Blue's Clue's house are thankful. We play Blue's Clues to find out what Blue is thankful for and learn about patience and sharing on the way.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Tickety's Big Musical Morning - Good Morning! We celebrate morning routines with Tickety as we sing a brand-new wakeup song and play a timely game of Blue's Clues to figure out what special time is coming up.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep204
programme.desc: The Trials of the Pirate Protector - On the first anniversary of becoming Pirate Protector, Santiago must complete a series of challenges meant to test his abilities and prove he's worthy all without the help of his tools or best mateys.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Silver Lasso - Santiago and Mami team up to take down an old foe and retrieve a lost family treasure.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Fish Friends Forever - When Baby Shark and friends enter a battle of the bands, Baby's rivalry with Shadow gets heated.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Best Friends Game - When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep907
programme.desc: Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art - Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Paddington's Nature Club / Paddington's not Himself - Mr. Curry wants to become a ranger leader & creates nature club to impress Ms. Potts but are his facts correct? // Paddington has a fall and loses his climbing confidence - without climbing he doesn't feel like himself at all - what can he do?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep238
programme.desc: The baby Piggy - Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chloé and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chloé have a great idea;

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep239
programme.desc: Nature Trail - Peppa and her family are driving out to the countryside to go for a walk in the woods. Peppa and George discover trails of footprints left by little birds and ants.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep240
programme.desc: Pretend Friend - Suzy Sheep has made up a pretend friend called “Leo Lion”. Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy says that Leo likes roaring and dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo. Even Mummy and Daddy Pig play along. But George feels a bit left out.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep177
programme.desc: The Funny Photo - While flipping through her Funny Photo Album, Froga is surprised to learn she has no funny picture of Anna! Setting off to remedy this, Froga instills the assistance of her friends to try to score a hilarious photo of Anna.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep178
programme.desc: The Gift Box - The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. When he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift, Christopher is convinced Bubu doesn't like his present.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Barbabright Has a Secret / Super Duper Cool - Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Joshini The Amazing - Periwinkle is planning a magic show! The Amazing Joshini and YOU, are eager to perform the greatest magic trick the Blue's Clues house has ever seen! But which one? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep802
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sweet Mayor / Pups Save a Magic Trick - Encased in a huge chocolate bunny, Humdinger is carried away by hungry raccoons and ends up floating in Adventure Bay with a curious dolphin. // When a magic trick goes awry, the Adventure Bay Easter Festival is overrun by wild bunnies.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Save The Bees / Duck Dilemma - All the bees in the Central Forest are captured by Sir Steel for their honey and Deer Squad have to come to their rescue! // Kai invents a Roboduck to babysit the ducklings, but it goes haywire and takes down all the technology in Platinum City.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep212
programme.desc: The Big Bug Hunt/Deer Ball - Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with. // Things get competitive when Sir Steel takes on the Deer Squad for the Deer Ball Cup - but who's bending the rules?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep226
programme.desc: Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog - Paddington & the Kids overhear Mr. Brown talking about selling the house! Will they really have to leave Windsor Gardens? // The kids are playing in the garden & make a prickly discovery. Something is not right so Paddington asks Baaz to help.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Paddington Sells Bessie - The Browns are fed up with Bessie the campervan breaking down, so Paddington sells her but soon regrets being so helpful.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Boris / Born To Be Wild - The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Making Bread / From One Pit to Another - Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Super-Shark / William vs. Wild - Inspired by their favorite TV show, She-Shark, Baby Shark and William set out to be superheroes. // After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Baby Mayor - The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Detectives - Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Super Christopher - Christopher visits Anna with his " Super Christopher" costume, ready for adventure! But being a superhero comes with a whole set of challenges. Christopher isn't just a superhero. He's also a super friend.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep129
programme.desc: Froga's Hat - Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep135
programme.desc: The Remember-ator - Froga can't seem to remember anything today! Even her piano lesson with Christopher! S+he decides to put sticky notes all around the house as reminders. But it is not very convenient! Bubu offers to be her reminder, friends the best reminders of all!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep141
programme.desc: King for a Day - Today the friends play King For A Day, someone throws the crown on Christopher's head! Then the crown leaves his head and ends on his cousin, Benjy, who just came for a day visit. Benjy only wants to play with his cousin, and do whatever he wants.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep147
programme.desc: Super Hero Teacher - Froga is so enamored with Super-Christopher, she decides that she wants to learn how to become Super-Froga! Christopher takes on the challenge of being her superhero instructor and after a rocky start, the two become terrific super partners.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep244
programme.desc: The Toy Cupboard - Peppa and George's toy basket is full and their beds are covered in toys. Mummy Pig orders a new toy cupboard, but it needs to be assembled – and Mummy and Daddy Pig are not good at DIY.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep245
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Pig - Peppa and her family borrow Grandpa Pig’s boat for a day on the river. Daddy Pig is the captain, Peppa, George and Mummy Pig are the crew. When the boat gets stuck in some long reeds. Daddy Pig has to use all his strength to push the boat free.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep246
programme.desc: The Quarrel - Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep248
programme.desc: Bouncy Ball - Peppa and George are playing in the garden with their bouncy ball when Suzy Sheep turns up with two tennis rackets. She uses the bouncy ball to play a game of tennis with Peppa, making George feel left out. Will the job of ball boy cheer him up?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Foggy Day - Mummy and Daddy Pig are taking Peppa and George to play in the playground. On the way it gets a bit foggy, and soon it is so foggy they can’t see. They decide to go home. But which way is home?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Helicopter - Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her rescue helicopter.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep503
programme.desc: Basketball - Daddy teaches the kids how to play basketball, and it is not long before they are good enough to take on a team.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Orange Empire - The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Grass is Always Greener... / When I Grow Up - Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Dragon Island Duel - It's the day of the Dragon Island Duel, a race around tropical Dragon Island! But when Crusher cheats and sends Blaze away before the race, AJ must set out to rescue his best friend and bring him back to the starting line.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Lifeguard Blaze! - Today, Blaze and AJ are on a mission to become Lifeguards. But it'll take four daring rescues to achieve their official Lifeguard badge and only the bravest monster trucks have what it takes.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Pups Save a Friend / Pups Save a Stowaway - When Marshall decides to take a break from the PAW Patrol, the pups jump into action to bring him back! // When the pups find a stowaway on their trip to the Icy Tundra, they must rescue a run-away kitty on a run-away Snow Cat!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Pups' Adventures in Babysitting / Pups Save the Fireworks - Mayor Goodway calls on the Paw Patrol to rescue her twin niece and nephew from a tree, and then twin sit for the day! // Expecting the fireworks for Adventure Bay Day, Mayor Goodway receives a package of piglets after a mix-up!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Over the rainbow / We're toast - The search for gold at the end of the rainbow leads the Deer Squad to an amazing Frost Mountain and a new deer friend! // The Deer Squad have to deal with a cheesy situation thanks to Sir Steel's latest invention - The Giant Toaster!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Diamond geezer - To impress Lady Fluffpot, Sir Steel tries to get his hands on Jade's precious Rainbow Diamond!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Paddington's Radio Show / Paddington's Butler - Mr. Curry's & Paddington's favorite radio show is cancelled - how will they ever know the ending now? // Mr. Curry ends up being Paddington's butler for the day - but he's better giving orders than taking them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Paddington becomes a Talent Show Judge / Paddington Keeps Up With The Kamalis - It's the Windsor Gardens Pet show, Paddington is the judge but they're all so talented how can he choose? / Paddington Judy & Jonathan learn that playing with your neighbors is more fun than trying to outdo them even if Toq keeps copying their ideas!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep249
programme.desc: The Powercut - One day all the lights suddenly go out and Peppa’s house is plunged into darkness. There has been a power cut. While they wait for the electricity to come on again, Peppa and George have fun looking for a torch and thinking of games to play.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep250
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Birthday - Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep251
programme.desc: Sleepover - Peppa is going for a sleepover at Zoë Zebra’s house with Suzy Sheep, Rebecca Rabbit, Candy Cat and Emily Elephant. The girls stay up playing games and having fun. At last they feel sleepy. They all snuggle up in their sleeping bags and fall asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep252
programme.desc: Stars - It is night time and the sky is full of stars. Mummy and Daddy Pig let Peppa and George put their coats on and they go outside to look at the stars. The stars look very tiny, but when Peppa and George look through a telescope the stars look bigger.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Trouble in Harmony Valley! - Everyone in the Old West town of Harmony Valley loves playing music together. But when noisy Billy Joe Strumlouder rides into town to sabotage their tunes, Sheriff Zooli must save the day--with music!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Blue's Big Costume Parade - Everyone's dressed up in silly costumes for our BIG costume parade, but we don't know what costume Blue wants to wear! As we play Blue's Clues to figure it out, we help Shovel make a truck-tastic costume and skidoo into Jill's puppet theater play!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep116
programme.desc: Circus - It's Teletubby Circus time! Tinky Winky balances on the tight rope, Dipsy juggles, Laa-Laa flies on the trapeze and Po is a funny clown.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S3) Ep1
programme.desc: Cake - Dee encourages a friend to say 'cake' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. There's sticky cake, a sprinkles cake and even a muddy looking cake!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep58
programme.desc: Finn Fun - How can Logi-Po join in and play with his pet friend Finn the fish in just the same way that Tinpo plays with his hamster Herman?

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep33
programme.desc: It's time for Halloween - JoJo and Gran Gran are getting ready for a Halloween party, but when JoJo accidentally squashes their spooky pumpkin lantern, they need a replacement! Luckily Gran Gran has a Gran Gran Plan!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep14
programme.desc: Best Bike in the World - When Monty gets a new bike, he must say goodbye to his old one. He wonders why you have to let go of things when you outgrow them.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep13
programme.desc: Rainy Day - Monty wonders whether there is a way to have fun outside, even when it's raining.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep3
programme.desc: Featherwand - Bluey and Mum are off to Chloe's party and Bingo isn't invited. But armed with a magic featherwand that makes things incredibly heavy, Bingo can now stop them leaving the house.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep51
programme.desc: The Teddy Bear Badge - The dog and the squirrels take their teddy bears out for a picnic. However, they soon spot a huge teddy and discover it's Beryl.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep50
programme.desc: The Surprise Badge - The squirrels and Duggee buy Hennie a surprise present for her birthday - but first they need to wrap it up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep49
programme.desc: The Sewing Badge - Duggee is sewing and makes a snazzy poncho, inspiring the squirrels to make one too. When they hear a very loud sneeze, the group investigates and finds a polar bear with a cold.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep20
programme.desc: The Dead Sea, Middle East - The Go Jetters are relaxing by the Dead Sea when Grandmaster Glitch causes a catastrophe.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep19
programme.desc: Amazon Rain Forest, South America - Glitch wants a picnic so he stops the rain in the rainforest, upsetting the tree frogs.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep2
programme.desc: Hammerbarn - On a trip to Hammerbarn, Bluey and Bingo create their own mini-homes side-by-side in the trolley. But Bluey quickly gets jealous of her neighbour, Bingo.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: Dance Mode - After Dad eats her last chip, Bingo is given three chances to put Mum and Dad in "Dance Mode" as payback. But the others can't resist taking Bingo's turns for her.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures (S1) Ep11
programme.desc: Sabre-Toothed Cat & Roar - Andy leaps into his time-travelling clock to visit a fearsome sabre-toothed cat, but when his gizmo malfunctions he is accidentally shrunk down to the size of an insect.

programme.title: Ranger Hamza's Eco Quest (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: Seaweed - Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how seaweed plays such an important role in the environment.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S5) Ep24
programme.desc: Captain's Vote - Captain Captain is in a frantic mood because she has lost her pirate handbook.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep48
programme.desc: The Detective Badge - A freshly baked apple pie is swiped from Duggee's windowsill, so he dons his detective badge to track down the thief.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep47
programme.desc: The Submarine Badge - The dog and the squirrels go off on an underwater adventure with Betty's dad in his submarine, spotting creatures including a giant sea stallion and some jazz fish.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep46
programme.desc: The Bubble Badge - The dog blows a lot of bubbles with his pot of bubble mixture. Though it is quite hard to do, most of the squirrels eventually get the hang of it and the clubhouse fills up with lots of bubbles.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep18
programme.desc: The Northern Lights, Finland - Ubercorn is excited to see the Northern Lights, but Glitch's Grunge-Grimbler covers them with smoke.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep17
programme.desc: Table Mountain, South Africa - Glitch wants to ski, so the Grimbots give Table Mountain a snowy peak, which threatens its rare plants.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S16) Ep13
programme.desc: Sodor Surprise Day - It is Sodor Surprise Day, which involves everyone trying to surprise each other. At Tidmouth Sheds, Thomas and Charlie are surprising each other. Gordon thinks they are being very silly indeed.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep11
programme.desc: Seacow Snow Trail - Sarah and Duck have received some Christmas Presents and are keen to find out who delivered them.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep10
programme.desc: Garden Gaming - Duck is getting frustrated with his new computer game, so Sarah builds a version he can play.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep43
programme.desc: Spring Snow - In the winter forest, Nelly and Nora discover a little tree that thinks Spring has come.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) Ep51
programme.desc: Dog Loves Diaries - Dog and Pug are trying to remember what they did yesterday. Their diary tells them that they found Granny Pug's lunchbox. They go off to find her but she on the other side of a ravine.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep11
programme.desc: Matching Socks - When Monty can't find a pair of matching socks, he begins to wonder why things have to match at all.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep30
programme.desc: The Thing That Called Bob - The Dinopaws come over the hill wondering what makes them - them?

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep57
programme.desc: The Big Picture - A young artist on the way up needs help to reach the top... of the wall he is painting.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep58

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep45
programme.desc: The First Aid Badge - The squirrels are playing Copy the King when Tag falls over and bumps his knee. Luckily, Duggee has his First Aid badge, so he can bandage Tag up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep44
programme.desc: The Be Careful Badge - When Naughty Monkey starts throwing bananas down from his branch, Ethel slips and the squirrels investigate.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep43
programme.desc: The Big Parade Badge - Duggee and the squirrels help out when the leader of the Big Parade hurts his leg.

programme.title: Art Works Ep16
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Sampa the Great shares how reconnecting with her heritage influenced her latest album. We check out an AFL-inspired "living sculpture" at Rising. Benjamin Law and Vanessa Alexander unpack how to tell real stories on screen.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 31 - Sophie Thomson visits a eucalyptus oil farm, Costa Georgiadis reworks a banana circle, Tino Carnevale explores a home-grown arboretum, and we visit the home of an interior stylist whose indoor plant collection will amaze you.

programme.title: Eat Smart Campaign Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - A look into Papua New Guinea's first Dairy production facility, which has created a model of self-sufficiency for the country. Chef Julz takes the fresh dairy products from the farm and goes all out baking.

programme.desc: Fearless and forensic investigative journalism from the award-winning team who claimed Australian journalism's top honour the 2022 Gold Walkley Award.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep3

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2252
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: Grande Prémio Tissot de Portugal Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The event was first held in 1987 at the Jarama circuit in Spain. The reason for this was because the main Portuguese circuit at the time, the Circuito do Estoril, was not yet ready to be used for motorcycle racing. However, Portugal still wanted to host a round in the championship that year, and so opted to use the Jarama circuit until their own was ready for use. In 1988, a second race was held at the new Jerez circuit which was also located in Spain.[1] The original plan was to host the race in Portugal at the Estoril circuit, but Jerez was chosen instead. The race was also named 'EXPO '92', referring to the expo of a similar name held at the Spanish city of Seville that year. This makes Portugal the only country to host multiple grands prix under Portuguese flag and name, despite the locations of the venues not being located in the country itself.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2252

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Yan vs. Dvalishvili
programme.desc: Prelims - A relentless force meets an immovable tank on March 11 when former bantamweight champion Petr “No Mercy” Yan faces Merab “The Machine” Dvalishvili in a highly anticipatedUFC Fight Night main event at The Theater at Virgin Hotels in Las Vegas. On the road to regaining his 135-pound crown, Yan’s resume includes knockouts of Urijah Faber and Jose Aldo, and he plans on adding Dvalishvili’s name to that list, but with eight consecutive wins and an aggressive attack that has seen him defeat Aldo, Marlon Moraes and Cody Stamann, “The Machine” is no one’s stepping stone

programme.title: Grande Prémio Tissot de Portugal Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The event was first held in 1987 at the Jarama circuit in Spain. The reason for this was because the main Portuguese circuit at the time, the Circuito do Estoril, was not yet ready to be used for motorcycle racing. However, Portugal still wanted to host a round in the championship that year, and so opted to use the Jarama circuit until their own was ready for use. In 1988, a second race was held at the new Jerez circuit which was also located in Spain.[1] The original plan was to host the race in Portugal at the Estoril circuit, but Jerez was chosen instead. The race was also named 'EXPO '92', referring to the expo of a similar name held at the Spanish city of Seville that year. This makes Portugal the only country to host multiple grands prix under Portuguese flag and name, despite the locations of the venues not being located in the country itself.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2252
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC 285: Jones vs. Gane
programme.desc: Prelims - The undisputed UFC heavyweight championship will be on the line on March 5 when former 205-pound champion Jon Jones makes the move north to face France’s Ciryl Gane in the main event of UFC 285 at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas. A top contender who has won 11 of his 12 pro bouts, defeating the likes of Derrick Lewis, Junior Dos Santos and Tai Tuivasa while also wearing the interim heavyweight title belt, Gane now has the vacant undisputed crown in his sights, but to get it, he has to hold off the charge of UFC superstar Jones, whose storied career in the light heavyweight division now gets a second chapter among the heavyweights, where “Bones” will attempt to make history by becoming a two-division champion. Plus, Valentina Shevchenko will look to continue her dominant reign atop the flyweight division when she faces surging Mexican contender Alexa Grasso for the 125-pound crown.
